import React , {useState} from 'react' import { IonPage,IonApp,IonToast, IonButton, IonButtons ,IonMenu, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonTitle, IonContent, IonList, IonItem, IonRouterOutlet, IonMenuButton, IonMenuToggle} from '@ionic/react' function App() { const [showToast, setShowToast] = useState(false) const handleclick = () => { setShowToast(!showToast) } return ( Menu Inbox Outbox Favorites Archived Trash Spam Inbox

Hello World

Click Me Open Menu ) } export default App
